pr_title: BFD-8: Map dual_01..dual_12 and rfnrc-yr fields to coverage resource

timeline.message: Add dual_01..dual_12 and rfnrc-Yr to coverage.

timeline.bodyText:
Does any of this data need to be added to the reference files used in the unit tests, to ensure the assertions are still accurate?
I noticed some failing unit tests in the Github Actions CI... could it be because the rfrnc_yr was not added to these resource files used in unit test comparison?
timeline.author: msnook

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the tip. Updated those resources to reflect the new coverage responses expected. Tests now pass.
replies.author: jzulim

timeline.message:
Revert "Updating test resources for coverage"

This reverts commit 3a19a89d72ffe84c836e58122e8807b688b51bdd.
Updating Coverage endpoint resources for tests
